snippet.title: Phantasy Star Zero - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Phantasy Star Zero has arrived in the US! As part of our many celebrations, we're also unveiling this launch trailer to show off the game and what makes PSZ stand apart from every other RPG on the DS. 

A hybrid of both the text story-centric original Phantasy Star games, and built on the foundation of Phantasy Star Online's combat and character classes, PSZ is almost everything good about Phantasy Star combined into one package. 

If you guys have any questions about the game, let us know in the comments - either ourselves or the fans will answer for you!
